text: Arlon W. Lindner (August 3, 1935 â€“ February 1, 2021) was an American Republican politician. He was born in Beaumont, Texas. Lindner was a member of the Minnesota House of Representatives from 1993 to 2005. Lindner died on February 1, 2021 in Rogers, Minnesota at the age of 85.Arlon W.
